pros: Very flexible scheduling to accommodate classes, treated with respect, friendly atmosphere.
cons: Low wages because of work study program.

review_title: If you love gossip parties then this is the place to work.
pros: Beautiful Campus.  At one time the administrators were somewhat competent at their jobs.  That time has sorely passed.  Watch your back if you choose to work here.
cons: Some supervisors believe that a hostile work environment is natural.  The aforementioned supervisors have never had to go through the pains of constant hostile actions directed at them.  Very poor communication except for the everyday gossip parties.  The campus would be great if the administration dealt with real issues rather than made up drama. Dreadfully poor decision making process is leading to a negative and extremely toxic atmosphere.  If you kiss-behinds you will get ahead here, if not, forget about it!   BEWARE!!!!!

pros: Beautiful local surroundings, tight nit community, employees highly engaged and supportive
cons: small town views on higher education, limited resources within community, struggling administration

review_title: Good place to work if you don't mind part time. Carering dept. is no longer in operation.
cons: Was part time only. UCC has closed the catering dept.

job_title: Student Services Advisor in Roseburg, OR
cons: No respect, they also do not promote well and have high turnover.

pros: friendly helpful co-workers and great community
cons: Admins over paid, classified staff under paid
